enhanced_description: Decode HR is an innovative and agile strategic HR consulting firm based in Singapore, specializing in complete HR practice transformation and targeted solutions for specific HR challenges. With a strong team of senior HR Consultants, boasting deep experience across diverse sectors in Asia, Decode HR provides strategic advice and high-impact HR solutions. A key strength is leveraging technology to strengthen human capital. They uniquely integrate critical HR expertise with Finance and PR skills and insights to achieve desired outcomes pre and post integration, focusing on organization transformation, engagement, retention, and performance. DecodeHR also offers expertise in developing robust Competency Frameworks and strategic, well-structured, and balanced Compensation & Benefits programs.
